# [String Formatting](https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/python-string-formatting/problem?isFullScreen=true)
## Easy

<li>Decimal</li>

<p><strong>Function Description</strong>   </p>

<p>Complete the <em>print_formatted</em> function in the editor below.   </p>

<p><em>print_formatted</em> has the following parameters:   </p>

<ul>
<li><em>int number:</em> the maximum value to print  </li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Prints</strong>   </p>
